A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, what a fantastic movie this is\, I really do not understand the criticism this has got from some fans\, yes it took risks\, but who wants to see the same star wars done before format\, I wanted something different and I was not disappointed\, I only wish Rian Johnson was directing episode 9.\nLeave your brain at the door and prepare to be entertained.
